DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is the evaluation of the frequency of xerostomia and their management after radiotherapy in head and neck cancer. The quality of life of these patients is also analysed with European Organization for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of life Questionnaire H&N35 (EORTC QLQ H&N35).
DOC.brief_title: Frequency of Xerostomia and Their Management in Upper Aerodigestive Tract Cancer Patients After the End of Radiotherapy
